00197    /*
00198    * Get the state id for a molecule.
00199    */
00200    inline 
00201    int SpeciesMutator::moleculeStateId(const Molecule& molecule) const

00204    /*
00205    * Get the occupancy (number of molecules) in a specific internal state.

00208    int SpeciesMutator::stateOccupancy(int stateId) const
